statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY aa.HolidayDate) AS RowNo , aa.ID , aa.CreatedOn , aa.CreatedBy , aa.CreatedByName , aa.UpdatedOn , aa.UpdatedBy , aa.UpdatedByName , aa.HolidayDate , aa.Description FROM dbo.THoliday aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND aa.HolidayDate >= CONVERT(DATE, #CalYear#+'0101', 112) AND aa.HolidayDate <= CONVERT(DATE, #CalYear#+'1231', 112)
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.THoliday aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID=#ID#
SELECT * FROM dbo.THoliday aa WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE aa.HolidayDate = #HolidayDate#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.THoliday ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, HolidayDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #HolidayDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCalendar SET UpdatedOn = GETDATE() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, HolidayDate = #HolidayDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
